Text: Tak aboke̩le̩ Kiriat-jearim lewa, ma la mʼakpati Jihofa du, oñ ma mʼu du le tʼunyi Abinadab oj uwo le̩. Taku ma fʼE̩leaza, o̩ma-wñ, o̩la gworinyo̩ kʼi fo̩, kʼi de akpati Jihofa.
Oñ akwʼo̩jo̩ kʼakpati le̩ kwogugu; Kiriat-jearim, iko-wñ kpo̩kpe̩, todu o̩do̩ ogu i che. Oñ abunyi Israe̩l chaka fʼo̩la eku mu atene Jihofa.

Taku Samiue̩l ko̩la ñw abo unyi Israe̩l chaka kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼame̩ adabi wa abo̩ Jihofa kpai e̩do̩-me̩ chaka ochochi, mak ame̩ ki kʼode abononojo kpai Ashtaro̩t rinyo̩ bʼef ume̩ te̩, kʼame̩ dʼe̩do̩-me̩ kado Jihofa ku me̩ rʼowñ kate; tak i agba me̩ kwef o̩wo̩ abo Filistia.
Abe̩le̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l mʼamiBeal kpai Ashtaro̩t ko rinyo̩, oñ ma re̩ Jihofa kate.
Taku Samiue̩l kakini, Me̩ kʼabo Israe̩l chaka wa jo̩ Mizpa, oñ narodubo̩ Jihofa todu me̩.
Taku ma jeju Mizpa, oñ ma fʼomiofo kpa, taku ma mʼu du dajane̩ o̩gba Jihofa, ma laño̩ ji alu o̩jo̩ le̩. O̩mo̩ ma ño̩ kakini, A du Jihofa re me̩. Samiue̩l la fʼajo̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l ka Mizpa.
Oñ e̩gba kʼabo Filistia gbo̩ ka kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l wa jo̩ Mizpa, amo̩ga abo Filistia te̩gu nyʼakobʼabo Israe̩l. Tak e̩gba kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l gbo̩, ma railo abo Filistia.
Oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l ka ñwu Samiue̩l kakini, Ekwa kʼe̩ kwa do̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa todu wa ki nʼuda n, kʼi jadu wa kʼa we etʼo̩wo̩ abo Filistia.
Taku Samiue̩l mʼo̩mala kʼi añmʼe̩nya du, oñ i mʼu du che iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo odukulu ñwu Jihofa. Samiue̩l ño̩ kwado̩ Jihofa todu Israe̩l; Jihofa la mʼohi du ñw u.

Oñ abu ku Samiue̩l do̩mo̩ ache iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩ abo Filistia te̩ wa ku ma jogu kpai abo Israe̩l; Jihofa muda nʼomu akpabana lile ka rʼabo Filistia oji o̩jo̩ le̩, oñ i fʼuma biya; oñ abo-ma fʼuma ne rʼo̩gba abo Israe̩l.
Tak aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l kwo Mizpa ranʼabo Filistia, oñ ma gwo ma gbogbo taku ma lewa o̩gane̩ Be̩tkar.
Taku Samiue̩l mʼokuta du oñ i mʼu du dago agbagba Mizpa kpai She̩n, oñ i dʼodu-wñ ko̩ E̩be̩niza,
Abe̩le̩ ma fʼabo Filistia du, ma la ño̩ daba alo̩me̩ abo Israe̩l ge̩ n. O̩wo̩ Jihofa la chagwunyʼabo Filistia iko Samiue̩l le̩ du.

Tak ewo ewo kʼabo Filistia bʼabo Israe̩l gba, ma mʼu du dabi wa ñw Israe̩l akwo E̩kron gbogbo wa Gat, abo Israe̩l la mʼane̩-ma gba bʼo̩wo̩ abo Filistia te̩. Tak uja ño̩ dʼagbagba abo Israe̩l kpai abo Amo̩r ge̩ n.
Oñ Samiue̩l kajo̩ abo Israe̩l gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku-wñ.
1 la dagbala le tu Be̩te̩l kpai Gilgal kpai Mizpa aro̩ne arone o̩do̩ o̩do̩: i laño̩ kajo̩ abo Israe̩l ugbo-i chaka.
Oji eda-wñ la che Rama, todu o̩mo̩ unyi-wñ de̩; i laño̩ kajo̩ abo Israe̩l o̩mo̩ ge̩. I ño̩ fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kpa ñwu Jihofa o̩mo̩.
